title: Pongomia glabra
Vernacular name: English- Smooth leaved pongamia </br> Hindi- Dithouri, Karuinai </br> Gujarati- Kanajo, Karanji </br>
Parts of plant used: Fruit ,  leaves , stem , seeds , root and bark.
Therapeutic uses: Used in treating skin diseases , in treatment of piles & haemorrhoids, to treat diabetes, to treat gout & syphilis, as Anti-ulcer, Antidiarrhoeal, Anti-plasmodial, Anti-inflammatory, Anti-viral and as Anti-bacterial.
